people.name: Bai Mengxiong
people.info: Founder of the mansion house and imperial physician; father of three sons: Bai Yingyuan, Bai Yingxuan, Bai Yingyu.

people.name: Bai Yingyuan
people.info: Eldest son who inherited the family business; married to Li; father of two sons: Bai Jingyi and Bai Jingsi.

people.name: Bai Yingxuan
people.info: Second son; married to Bai Wen (second wife); father of one son Bai Jingqi and one daughter Bai Yuting.

people.name: Bai Yingyu
people.info: Third son, a playboy; married to Zhou; father of one son Bai Jingwu and one daughter Bai Yufen.

people.name: Bai Jingyi
people.info: Eldest son of Bai Yingyuan; continued the medical practice; married to Wang; father of Bai Zhanyuan.

people.name: Bai Jingsi
people.info: Second son of Bai Yingyuan; married to Zhao; father of Bai Zhanguang.

people.name: Bai Jingqi
people.info: Only son of Bai Yingxuan and a central figure of the mansion; first married to Huang Chun, later to Yang Jiuhong and Li Xiangxiu; father of four sons: Bai Jingye, Bai Jinggong, Bai Jingsheng, and Bai Jingtang.

people.name: Bai Jingwu
people.info: Son of Bai Yingyu; married to Sun; father of Bai Zhanhai.

people.name: Bai Zhanyuan
people.info: Son of Bai Jingyi; joined the revolution; married to He Qi; father of Bai Jianguo.

people.name: Bai Zhanguang
people.info: Son of Bai Jingsi; married to Wu; father of Bai Xiaomei (daughter).

people.name: Bai Jingye
people.info: Eldest son of Bai Jingqi; a prodigal; married to Tang Youqiong; father of Bai Zhan'an.

people.name: Bai Jinggong
people.info: Second son of Bai Jingqi; inherited the family business; married to Zhou; father of Bai Zhanping.

people.name: Bai Zhanhai
people.info: Son of Bai Jingwu; married to Li; father of Bai Jianjun.

people.name: Bai Jianguo
people.info: Son of Bai Zhanyuan; an engineer; married to Zhang Lihua; father of Bai Haoran.

people.name: Bai Zhan'an
people.info: Son of Bai Jingye; married to Wang Xiulan; father of Bai Yuxin (daughter).

people.name: Bai Zhanping
people.info: Son of Bai Jinggong; a businessman; married to Chen Meiling; father of Bai Haoyu.

people.name: Bai Jianjun
people.info: Son of Bai Zhanhai; a doctor; married to Liu Fang; father of Bai Haoxuan.
